laboratory_examinations.findings: Novely heterozygous variants in ACAN identified in affected individuals; Family 1 had a frameshift mutation (c.272delA), Family 2 had a splice donor site variant (c.2026G>A), and Family 3 had a missense variant (c.7064T>C).
Bone age was markedly advanced at 9.0 years.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: His bone age has remained advanced approximately 4 years above chronologic age on repeat bone age assessments.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Bone age was advanced at 14 years and 0 months.
Bone age assessment revealed an advanced bone age of 13 years and 0 months.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat bone age assessments during GnRH analog treatment at chronologic age 12 years 5 months, and at 13 years 5 months were read as 13 years and 0 months, confirming that GnRH agonist treatment successfully blocked bone age advancement.
